Message.Title: I am glad.I moved my money to TIVO
Message.Msg: TIVO is claiming billions of dollars in damages in a lawsuit against Google Inc.'s Motorola Mobility unit. Bloomberg reports the company (NASDAQ: TIVO) is claiming the huge damages because of the number of infringing digital video recorders made by Motorola. TiVo disclosed the figure in a request to consolidate the case with another involving Cisco Systems Inc. (NASDAQ: CSCO). Google (NASDAQ: GOOG) bought Motorola Mobility for $12.5 billion in May.

Message.Title: $900 target- Upgrades coming! #1 tech buy today.
Message.Msg: Pray for the Palestinian people. I lost 13 relatives on April 9, 1948 in the Massacre at Deir Yassin. The Deir Yassin massacre took place on April 9, 1948, when 200 heavily armed fighters from the Irgun terrorist group and Israel Zionist paramilitary groups attacked Deir Yassin near Jerusalem, a Palestinian-Arab village of roughly 500 people. Around 300 of the 500 villagers were slaughtered in cold blood during and after the battle for the village, including women, children and 37 infants â€”some were shot, while others died when hand grenades were thrown into their homes. Israeli terrorists proceeded to duplicate Deir Yassin in 178 more villages in the West Bank, and the result has been more than 750,000 murdered civilian Palestinians, who were only guilt y of being Palestinians. Americans remained silent then, as now, "for fear of the Jews".
